modName: triss armor re tex dragon hunter
summary: just a simple retexture of the triss armor, abit of a re-colour and combined with elements of the dragon scale armor
descriptionHtml:
re texture of the triss armor combined with elements of the dragon scale armor.

pretty much finished now but open to ideas.

just dump the mesh/tex folders into the skyrim data folder and when propmpted combine/ override files.

Major thanks to Fouracres for tweaking the meshes to remove the ties down the front and the horrible shine/ stripe effect that appeared in game.

thanks to the original converter/uploader of the triss armor
.


enjoy
author: adamc123
